nodes.title: Simulated Annealing: From Physics to Optimization
nodes.excerpt: Introduction Optimization problems are everywhere: finding the shortest route, minimizing energy in physical systems, training neural…
nodes.description: Exploring the mathematical foundations of Simulated Annealing, showing how it emerges from fundamental principles of statistical mechanics and how theoretical results guarantee its convergence under certain conditions.

nodes.title: With Images

nodes.description: Defence Against the Dark Arts (abbreviated as DADA) is a subject taught at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry and Ilvermorny School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. In this class, students study and learn how to defend themselves against all aspects of the Dark Arts, including dark creatures, curses, hexes and jinxes (dark charms), and duelling.
